title: Scheduling & Auto-Close
description: Schedule polls for future posting and configure auto-close

content.text: Schedule polls to be posted at a future date and time. Perfect for recurring check-ins, weekly polls, or timed announcements.

items: Open the poll creation modal with /askify
Configure your poll (question, type, options, settings)
Under 'Post Timing', select 'Schedule for later'
Choose date and time using the datetime picker
Click 'Create Poll'

content.text: The poll will be posted automatically at the scheduled time. You'll receive a DM confirmation with the scheduled time displayed in your local timezone.
Scheduled polls appear in /askify list with a 'Scheduled' status. You can cancel them before they're posted.
Configure how and when your poll closes. Choose from three methods:
You close the poll manually when ready. A 'Close Poll' button appears in your creator DM.

items: Full control over close timing
No automatic closure
Best for polls with uncertain timelines

content.text: Poll closes automatically after a specified duration (e.g., 2 hours, 3 days).

items: Countdown timer shown in poll message
Closes automatically when time expires
Best for time-sensitive decisions

content.text: Poll closes at a specific date and time.

items: Pick exact close moment
Displayed in each voter's local timezone
Best for deadline-based polls

content.text: Enable reminders to DM non-voters before the poll closes, boosting participation.

items: Askify DMs channel members who haven't voted yet
Smart timing: 1 hour before close for short polls, 24 hours for longer polls
Includes a deep link back to the poll message
Only sent once per poll per user

content.text: In the poll creation modal, check the 'Send Reminders' checkbox under voting settings.
Reminders require an auto-close method (duration or date/time). They won't send for manual-close polls.
View and manage scheduled polls using /askify list:

items: Scheduled polls show with a 'Scheduled' badge
See the scheduled post time
Cancel button removes the scheduled poll before it posts
Cannot edit scheduled polls (cancel and recreate instead)

content.text: All times are displayed in each user's local timezone thanks to Slack's datetime formatting:

items: Scheduled post times show in your timezone
Close times adapt to each viewer's timezone
Consistent experience across global teams
